title: Paris Hilton shows off her stunning figure at Rande Gerber's Casamigos Halloween Party
text:
She holds her own star-studded Halloween party every year.

But that did not stop Paris Hilton from stealing attention at Rande Gerber and Mike Meldman's annual Casamigos Halloween party at Mike's Beverly Hills home on Friday evening.

The model, 38, wore daring lingerie which showed off her stunning figure paired with fluffy black bunny ears to give the look a fancy dress flourish.

Star: Paris Hilton stole the attention at Rande Gerber and Cindy Crawford's annual Casamigos Halloween party in Beverly Hills on Friday

Long satin gloves and feathery ears were a standout feature of the racy costume, which was also adorned with spooky spider web-style lace.

Paris showed off a flowing tail on the outfit as she posed with fans, while her honey-hued curls flowed over her eye-popping assets.

A pair of black sandal heels continued the frightening theme, aligning well with other guest's costumes and also boosting her already statuesque height.

Hosts Cindy and Rande showed off their best '60s and '70s-style looks, with the supermodel dressed in a colorful jumpsuit.

Naughty: The model, 38, daringly wore bunny-themed lingerie which showed off her stunning figure

All eyes on me: Long satin gloves and feathery ears were a standout feature of the racy costume, which was also adorned with spooky spider web-style lace

Can't get enough: And Paris showed off a flowing tail on the outfit as she posed with fans, while her ample honey-hued curls flowed over her busty frame

Rande was ready for a psychedelic 1960s concert in colorful butterfly-adorned pants and a leather waistcoat.

Cindy's luminous look was covered in strips of blue, green and yellow and decorated with gleaming sequins.

She accentuated her trim figure with a thick violet belt secured with a gold buckle, and her bell bottom pant legs culminated in a pair of open-toe heels.

A pair of black sandal heels continued the frightening theme, aligning well with other guest's costumes

Look at me: Businesswoman Paris did not disappoint with her costume effort at this year's bash

Rande launched Casamigos tequila back in 2013 with his co-founders George Clooney and Mike Meldman.

Meldman's home was decked out in a psychedelic theme, with a number of custom neon features and graffiti backdrop.

Guests were welcomed with a Casamigos ice shot and the crowd enjoyed signature cocktails including the Casa-delic, Magic Marg and Spicy Spirit.

Paris' outing at Casamigos comes after her own Halloween bash in Beverly Hills on Thursday where she pulled out all the stops for the stars.

It was attended by a host of stars including Larsa Pippen, Shanina Shaik, Brooklyn Beckham, Dorothy Wang, and EJ Johnson.

Hosts with the most: Cindy Crawford, 53, and Rande Gerber, 57, wore their best '60s and '70s–style looks Friday night as they hosted the party

Stars stepped out in an array of naughty costumes, with many daringly wearing very little indeed.

Earlier this month Paris launched her latest perfume, Electrify, in Mexico City.

Her perfume collection has sold over $2billion since its began in 2004 and continues to stay at the top of the celebrity market today.

Been busy: Paris's outing at Casamigos comes after her own Halloween bash in Beverly Hills on Thursday

Electrify is inspired by 'Hilton's true passion for music, dancing and living in the moment,' according to an official press release.

The release continues: 'ELECTRIFY captures the euphoria you feel as you dance the night away and lose yourself in the neon lights.

'It is made for the woman who isn't afraid to show her confidence, sensuality, and captivating personality.'
description: The model, 38, daringly wore bunny-themed lingerie at which showed off her stunning figure at the annual star-studded bash in Beverly Hills.
